name: 雪他 (yukita) - Arduino
tagline: The Arduino libraries used, coding, and everything else Arduino for 雪他 (yukita)
body:
### Welcome to the Arduino side of 雪他 (yukita).
All of our codding from prototype one to our final product can be found here. 

### Hardware
Specific hardware requirements for each individual sketch is located withing the sketch it's self, but here are all the things we used from alpha to final release:

- Arduino Uno   
- Relay Shield
- Ethernet Shield

### Software
We used a few different software platforms and Arduino libraries for this project:

- RobotC
- TouchOSC (iOS)
- TouchOSC Editor (PC)
- Blynk (iOS)
- OSCuino (OSC Library)

### Authors and Contributors
Huge shout out to @exedude for helping along the way with the coding! Others involved in the Arduino coding process include Tim Felker and @trippylighting. If you would like to become involved then branch off and notify us of any improvements. Want to be on-board with the official coding? Let us know!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with our code or have questions? Feel free to contact us at 234111@shakopeeschools.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
